entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23 except temperature rising to minus 8 along the foothills.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 except temperature rising to minus 8 along the foothills. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
